reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Scaling up the response to the HIV epidemic through strengthening national capacities, prevention and treatment services for most at risk population and maintaining access to and quality of essential MDR/XDR TB services in the Republic of Azerbaijan

description.narrative: Azerbaijan - TB/HIV - Ministry of Health of the Republic of Azerbaijan - MOH. This program has the following goals: To reduce HIV incidence and AIDS related mortality in Azerbaijan through scaled access of key affected populations to essential HIV prevention, diagnostic, treatment, care and support services. To reduce the socio-economic burden of TB in Azerbaijan through significant decline in TB (including drug-resistant TB) incidence, prevalence, and mortality. The objectives of this program are: To implement scaled evidence-based preventive activities focused on key affected populations. To achieve 90-90-90 HIV targets. Support health systems strengthening and integrate HIV/TB services to maximize health outcomes for patients. Ensure integrated, patient-centered care for TB with increased treatment success. Ensure program transition to national funding and sustainability

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Health of the Republic of Azerbaijan

title.narrative: Number of cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB that began second-line treatment
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of people in prisons or other closed settings that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people who inject drugs that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people on ART among all people living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
KP - Other 1: Number and percentage of people who inject drugs receiving Opioid Substitution Therapy
Percentage of TB patients with DST result for at least Rifampicin among the total number of notified (new and retreatment) cases in the same year
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Percentage of confirmed RR/MDR-TB cases tested for resistance to second-line drugs

Number of TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB notified

Percentage of transgender people that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
